summary: After a murder of a gamekeeper who catches them red-handed having just downed a deer, two teenage boys, conceited Ruda (Marek Probosz) and shy Václav (Zbigniew Suszynski) go on the run through the woods.
cast: Marek Probosz|Zbigniew Suszynski|Miroslav Machácek|Frantisek Peterka|Josef Patocka|Vladimír Hlavatý|Marie Jezková|Oldrich Velen|Vítezslav Jandák|Petr Skarke|Jaroslav Tomsa|Marta Vancurová|Emma Cerná|Jana Svandová|Jirí Schmitzer|Zdenka Sajfertová|Slávka Hamouzová|Zofie Kanyzová-Veselá|Jorga Kotrbová|Michal Pavlata|Jana Riháková|Eva Sitteová|Josef Vondrácek|Vlastimil Zavrel
title: Stín kapradiny
